text: Glamour is an online women's magazine published by Cond√© Nast Publications and based in New York City. It was originally called Glamour of Hollywood. From 1939 to 2019, Glamour was a print magazine. However because not a lot of people were subscribing to the magazine, Glamour's last print edition was in January 2019. ==References== Category:Magazines published in New York City
title: Glamour (magazine)
